thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cozy Stay
thread.title_full: Cozy Stay - Review of Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: JoanneLNg
title: Cozy Stay
text:
We, a family of 2 adults and 2 young kids stayed at Premier Inn Waterloo for 4d3n in March 2017. Although it is a basic hotel, it was just what we needed, the bed and a place to wash. It was better than what we were expecting in fact, the room was spacious enough for the kids to run around. The breakfast was good and has variety of choices, though we only had it once. It is a centrally located place, easy access to the Underground, walking distance to London Eye, Westminister Abbey etc. Lots of restaurant nearby so dining is not a problem. Will return again if we visit London in the future.
Room Tip: Request for room with view, ie London Eye See more room tips
